cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20)

    # set variable contains project name
    set(PROJECT_NAME
            Tutorial
    )

# set the project name
project(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}
        VERSION 1.0
)

    # specify the C++ standard
    set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD          17  )
    set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED True)

# add autogenerated header to pass the version
configure_file(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}Config.h.in
        ${PROJECT_NAME}Config.h
)

# add the executable
add_executable(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}
        tutorial.cxx
)

# for autogenerate header we must add the directory
# to the list of paths to search for include files
target_include_directories(
        ${PROJECT_NAME}
    PUBLIC
        "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}"
)
